entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: HttpRequestMessage.CustomMetricsTags #86281
  • Test failure: System.Buffers.Text.Tests.FormatterTests.TestFormatterSingle #86275
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] [tvOS] Failed to boot Apple TV: Unable to boot the Simulator #86274
  • Assertion failed: (GetComponentSize() <= 2) || IsArray() #86273
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector128 API's on Amd64 with mini JIT #86272
  • [6.0] [Android] CI failure: Interop_DllImportSearchPaths - Non-success instrumentation exit code: 101, expected: 100 #86271
  • Test failure: _Avx512F_VL_Vector128_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Avx512F_VL_Vector128.Program.ShiftRightArithmeticInt641() #86267
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Vectorization/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.dll #86265
    8.0.0
  • [mono] FullAOT compilation of Microsoft.iOS.dll crashes with managed static registrar #86264
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/VS-ia64-JIT/V2.0-RTM/b539509/b539509/b539509.dll #86263
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandlerFunctional.Tests.BidirectionStreamingTest.AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite failing #86262
  • .net7 HRESULT: 0x8007000E on linux with read-only fs #86259
  • superpmi-collect failing because MicroBenchmarks builds are failing #86258
  • tracing.runtimeeventsource times out with PGO enabled and R2R disabled #86253
    8.0.0
  • [iOS] System.Diagnostics.Process is not supported #86251
  • Add test for successfully matching current RID when reading an empty RID graph #86250
  • Directory.Delete(path, recursive: true) fails on directories containing junctions #86249
  • Add environment variables that enable to trust additional certificates from the file system. #86243
  • Linking an empty .NET MAUI app produces inconsistent binaries #86242
  • Should `PipeWriter.FlushAsync` throw if called after `PipeWriter.Complete`? #86239
  • Guarded devirtualization based on whole program view #86235
    8.0.0
  • Test failure _Vector64_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector64.Program.WidenInt64() #86234
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #86233
    8.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\typeequivalence\\simple\\Simple\\Simple.cmd #86232

Closed

  • Move ILLink.RoslynAnalyzer.Tests.Generator to be an IIncrementalGenerator-based source generator #86190
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 5/2/2023 10:35:24 AM #85987
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.AccessControl relies on deprecated package System.Security.Principal.Windows #86236
  • Add tests for src generated IServiceCollection.Configure implementations #83621
    8.0.0
  • [Breaking Change] Change CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap to only unwrap wrappers from the target ComWrappers instance #86189
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #84813
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\bigevent\\bigevent\\bigevent.cmd #85213
    8.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #86134
    8.0.0
  • jitstress: BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd failing #85261
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.AesGcm - decryption allows truncated tags #71366
    8.0.0
  • Memory usage reported by the process greatly mismatches the dump #85948
    8.0.0
  • DLLs created by Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator are built in debug mode #77136
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/SSA/MemorySsa/MemorySsa.sh #86231
  • When reflecting abstruct proterty in interface, "BadImageFormatException: Bad IL format" will be thrown. #86141
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #80447
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #81105
    8.0.0
  • Bump ICU to version 72 #80721
    8.0.0
  • fatal error LNK1295: '/INCREMENTAL' not compatible with '/DEBUGTYPE' specification... #64082
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Tests.HttpWebRequestTest_Sync.GetResponseAsync_ParametersAreCachableButDifferent_CreateNewClient #85436
    8.0.0
  • error when build native aot with selenium dotnet 7 #86202
  • SEHException (0x80004005): External component has thrown an exception #85231

PullRequests

Created

  • Support remaining collections in config binder generator #86285
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Alpine 3.18 #86284
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Write the generated file header to the ComInterfaceGenerator-generated files #86283
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms: support adding rids with '-' in the base part. #86282
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries

    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stop testing UnregisterFrozenSegment #86279

  • [draft][browser] threads experiment #86278
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

    area-R2RDump-coreclr

    needs-area-label

    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono] Prevent memory corruption when decoding UCO entry point #86266
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add -DCLI_CMAKE_FALLBACK_OS in CMakeSettings.json #86261
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0

    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Dynamic heap count #86245
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix floating-point args passing #86244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Do interface dispatch through a helper #86238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0

    area-Infrastructure-mono

    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
